paper_title.ja: Novel synthesis of a unique hedical quinone derivative by coupling reaction of 2-hydroxybenzo[c]phenanthrene

paper_title.en: Novel synthesis of a unique hedical quinone derivative by coupling reaction of 2-hydroxybenzo[c]phenanthrene

paper_title.ja: Synthesis of chiral [5]helicenes using aromatic oxy-Cope rearangment as a key step (共著)
paper_title.en: Synthesis of chiral [5]helicenes using aromatic oxy-Cope rearrangement as a key step

description.en: Both enantiomers of (P)-(+)-2- and (M)-(-)-2-acetoxy-11,14-dimethy][5]helicenes 8 were synthesized by asymmetric aromatic oxy-Cope rearrangement of the corresponding chiral bridged bicyclic compounds, which were obtained by enzymatic resolution. The absolute configurations of 8 were assigned by their circular dichroism spectra. (C) 2003 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Synthesis of chiral [5]helicenes using aromatic oxy-Cope rearrangement as a key step

description.en: Both enantiomers of (P)-(+)-2- and (M)-(-)-2-acetoxy-11,14-dimethy][5]helicenes 8 were synthesized by asymmetric aromatic oxy-Cope rearrangement of the corresponding chiral bridged bicyclic compounds, which were obtained by enzymatic resolution. The absolute configurations of 8 were assigned by their circular dichroism spectra. (C) 2003 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.ja: Synthetic study of bicyclo[5.2.1]dec-8-en-4-ones based on tandem anionic[1,3] and oxy-cope rearrangements of vinylbicyclo[3.2.1]oct-6-en-ols (共著)
paper_title.en: Synthetic study of bicyclo[5.2.1]dec-8-en-4-ones based on tandem anionic [1,3] and oxy-Cope rearrangements of 2-vinylbicyclo[3.2.1]oct-6-en-2-ols

description.en: An efficient one-pot synthesis of a 10,10-ethylenebicyclo[5.2.1]dec-8-en-4-one derivative, which can be considered as a synthetic intermediate for the taxane skeleton, has been achieved by tandem anionic [1,3] and oxy-Cope rearrangements of 2-vinylbicyclo[3.2.1] oct-6-en-2-ol. (C) 2002 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.
